title: Rabbonim Weigh in on NYC Mayoral Election
body: Rabbi leading poskim urge NYC's Jewish community to vote, citing it as a fundamental responsibility to guard freedoms.

title: Cuomo Downplays Polls at Shul
body: Former NY Gov. Andrew Cuomo spoke at Congregation Ohab Zedek, downplaying the importance of polls after a new survey showed a close race between him and Democratic nominee Zohran Mamdani.
